string-array.name: tweet
string-array.item: “I’ll be on @NewsHour tonight to discuss the Supreme Court vacancy. Look up your local @PBS station here: http://to.pbs.org/ISNw9C”
“Attention high school students: Applications are open for #CHCI’s #R2LNextGen program! http://bit.ly/1QcfuHL”
“Putting the country first means Obama nominating a Justice and the Senate doing its constitutional duty by voting on the nominee.”
